attributes.action: DO NOT INTRODUCE VACCINE PASSPORTS FOR ANY DISEASE OR VACCINE AS SET OUT IN LAW
attributes.additional_details:
MAKE IT CLEAR - THAT NO VACCINE IS MANDATORY FOR ANY DISEASE - AND THAT ANY HUMAN BEING HAS THE RIGHT TO REFUSE ANY MEDICATION / VACCINATION OR MEDICAL PROCEDURE AS PER THE LAW.
MAKE IT CLEAR THAT IT IS UNLAWFUL TO ENFORCE ANY TYPE OF VACCINE / MEDICATION PASSPORT SYSTEM WHICH MAY HINDER OR DISCRIMINATE AGAINST ANY PERSON WHO FOR WHATEVER REASON DOES NOT OR CAN NOT PARTAKE IN SUCH MEDICAL TRIALS, FORCED MEDICATIONS OR VACCINATIONS OR VACCINATION/ MEDICATION PASSPORTS OR OTHER FORMS OF ENFORCEMENT
attributes.background:
IT WILL BE UNLAWFUL FOR THE GOVERNMENT TO IMPLEMENT ANY VACCINE AND OR MEDICAL PROCEDURE OR TO MAKE IT LAW / MANDATORY FOR ANY DISEASE AS IT WILL BREACH THE LAW AS SET OUT IN THE 1984 CONTROL OF INFECTIOUS DISEASE ACT. 
THEREFORE ANY VOTE BY PARLIAMENT TO BE IMPLEMENTED WOULD BE UNLAWFUL.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition currently open on this topic:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
